description: Skilled Force-users can learn to manipulate their Force Powers in intriguing ways. Force Secrets represent a sublime connection to The Force and are usually available only to powerful Force-users such as Force Disciples, Jedi Masters, and Sith Lords.
notes: Activating a Force Secret costs either a Force Point or a Destiny Point (as noted in its description), and the normal limits on spending Force Points and Destiny Points during a round apply. Whenever you learn a new Force Secret, select it from the list below. Once selected, a Force Secret cannot be changed.

secrets.name: Devastating Power
secrets.description: Allows you to maximize the damage or effect of a Force Power.

secrets.name: Distant Power
secrets.description: Allows you to extend the range of a Force Power.

secrets.name: Multitarget Power
secrets.description: Allows you to affect multiple targets with a single-target Force Power.

secrets.name: Quicken Power
secrets.description: Allows you to activate a Force Power as a Swift Action instead of its normal action type.

secrets.name: Shaped Power
secrets.description: Allows you to shape the area of effect of a Force Power to exclude allies.

secrets.name: Corrupted Power
secrets.description: Allows you to corrupt a Force Power with dark side energy for enhanced effects.

secrets.name: Debilitating Power
secrets.description: Allows you to add debilitating effects to your Force Powers.

secrets.name: Enlarged Power
secrets.description: Allows you to increase the area of effect of a Force Power.

secrets.name: Pure Power
secrets.description: Allows you to purify a Force Power with light side energy for enhanced effects.

secrets.name: Remote Power
secrets.description: Allows you to use a Force Power at extreme range or on a location you can perceive but not see.

secrets.name: Extend Power
secrets.description: Allows you to extend the duration of a Force Power.

secrets.name: Linked Power
secrets.description: Allows you to link two Force Powers together for simultaneous activation.

secrets.name: Unconditional Power
secrets.description: Allows you to ignore conditions or prerequisites for using a Force Power.

secrets.name: Holocron Loremaster
secrets.description: Allows you to access and interpret information from Holocrons with greater clarity and depth.

secrets.name: Mentor
secrets.description: Allows you to mentor and train others more effectively, passing on your knowledge and abilities.
